solution_line_template: He eats {boxes_per_week} boxes for {weeks_per_year} weeks so he eats {boxes_per_week}*{weeks_per_year} = <<{boxes_per_week}*{weeks_per_year}={total_boxes}>>{total_boxes} boxes
Each box costs ${cost_per_box} and he buys {total_boxes} boxes so he spends {cost_per_box}*{total_boxes} = $<<{cost_per_box}*{total_boxes}={total_spend}>>{total_spend}
